title: Salahmu
author: Salahmu
content: I want to use this opportunity to acknowledge the importance and good impact the forum has done on our individual lives,  first I want to acknowledged the founder whose identity is unknown but called "Satoshi Nakamoto". Unlike other platform that existed for sometime and later crashed, but Bitcointalk forum is here to stay. The forum has provided an avenue were people that has no knowledge about crypto to come and learn from higher members and be aquinted with crypto knowledge, gone are those days when you pay or looking for people to show you how the crypto works and for you to venture into it, as such you will be charged for the services, but these forum does not only educate you about crypto but also provides a platform were you can be working to make some money after getting to certain Level such as Signature Campaign. To me these forum is like a news channels because it has almost all the sectors were you could get information about crypto, economics, and Local Board which comprises of different countries sharing information about their country through there local boards. I believe that through this forum so many persons has achieved something, please the floor is yours to share your knowledge and experience on how the forum has helped you in one way or the other.

comments.author: Latviand
comments.body: I would be lying if I say that it impacted my life so much, if I'm being honest, being involved in this forum is comparable almost to being a regular poster in Reddit, the only difference is there's a way to make money here although that's not entirely a difference. What made the most impact to me is probably bitcoin itself and not the forum, bitcoin changed my mindset about money, didn't know that I wanted freedom in my finances although I don't want to be too attached to material stuff anymore. Maybe I am still finding how this forum impacted me because there's still so much to learn.

comments.author: Abu-Naim
comments.body: Due to the forum's extensive sections, I still haven't read through everything, but I'm still learning a lot about Bitcoin for free.Since some of these news outlets do lie and propagate FUD, I now view this forum as the best location to confirm any news about Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies.

comments.author: ImThour
comments.body: Doesn't improve my life in a factor, it just makes it more entertaining as I get to reply on posts like these on the forum which claim to have a forum's impact on their lives.Pretty cool though, isn't it? In my case, it's the Bitcoin itself which made the pretty big impact, It taught me so many things like when, how and where to invest your money.I am blessed though to be part of this community and love to share my opinion proudly.

comments.author: Blitzboy
comments.body: Remember those early days? Crypto was an alien language back then. Bitcointalk broke the ice and made it easy. The seamless rookie-to-pro transition is its charm. Feel it? That early nostalgia! We now promote crypto beginners. Signature Campaigns: the ingenious incentive that's driven forum activity and growth. It's a fun, win-win merry-go-round.  Maintain the spirit, folks. We're Satoshi's torchbearers, not merely members. Wise men learn from others, and this forum is gold. Continue digging.

comments.author: kryptqnick
comments.body: I like this forum and I think its impact on my life has been very positive. Some have mentioned the Signature campaigns, which are of course a significant part of it, but there are other things. People discuss a lot of interesting questions here, and I regularly learn something new when reading the threads or doing my own research to respond to some questions. It really helps to think about economic matters from various perspectives and learn things that I now believe people should know, but I wouldn't have known without the forum. I also like the general vibe around here. We have people with very different political views, but the posts tend to be written in a respectful manner, providing facts, links, and arguments to support one's position. In my experience, discussions are of a very different kind and quality on many other platforms online.

comments.author: Vivageneviv
comments.body: Finally a thread to give this forum the flowers that it rightly deserves. Virtually everything I know in the crypto space started off here then with practice and consistency I got better. My early days in Bounties here are well documented, reviews on certain tokens and exchanges influenced my investments and trading approach, for instance I learnt about Dogecoin and Shiba here, aped them and made over 1000x accumulated profits, I've also learned about some CEX features here that I'm currently benefitting from, Copy Trading on Bitget for instance and so many favourable updates I've been privileged to get here. Long live Bitcointalk!
